Pre-Game Insights: Jose Berrios will take the mound for the Toronto Blue Jays against Matt Olson and the Atlanta Braves on Saturday at 7:20 p.m. ET.
The Braves have the 16th-ranked batting average in the majors (.241). The Blue Jays have the 25th-ranked ERA (4.37) in the majors this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Truist Park in Atlanta, Georgia.
Bally Sports will broadcast the game on TV.
Others: The game's odds and betting lines include the Braves as favorites with odds (-166) and the Blue Jays as underdogs (+141). The over/under for runs scored is set at 8.
